text: "Fly Too High" is a song by Janis Ian. It is a track from her 1979 LP, Night Rains. The song became a modest hit in the UK (#44), a major hit in Australia (#7), and a number-one hit in South Africa. "Fly Too High" was written and recorded for the film Foxes, and it is included on the soundtrack. ==Chart history== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Chart (1979-1980) !Peak position |- !scope="row"|Australia (Kent Music Report) | style="text- align:center;"|7 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|South Africa (Springbok Radio) |align="center"|1 |- |- !scope="row"|US Billboard Dance Club Songs |align="center"|30 |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Chart (1980) !Peak position |- !scope="row"|Australia (Kent Music Report) | style="text- align:center;"|33 |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Single Top 100) | style="text- align:center;"|62 |- !scope="row"|New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) |align="center"|39 |- !scope="row"|South Africa | style="text- align:center;"|16 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1979 songs Category:1979 singles Category:Janis Ian songs Category:Songs written by Janis Ian Category:Columbia Records singles Category:Number-one singles in South Africa Category:Songs written for films
